DialogueText.Text: Ah, you are not yet familiar with our Order's inner workings... I should have explained this to you sooner; my apologies.
Your efforts in working with us will not go unrewarded. For every task you complete, you shall be rewarded a
. They themselves lack any value of course, but instead represent your efforts. In return for these coins, I have an offering of rewards. I'm sure you shall find something that peaks your interests.
Would you like to have a look?
